display_long_description:
Step into a world where your deepest fears become reality and solve intricate puzzles that challenge both courage and intellect in this thrilling VR experience.

# FIND YOUR WAY across precarious platforms suspended in darkness, where falling is a constant threat.

[media]

# EXPLORE DIFFERENT FEATURES
Confront the fear of heights as you navigate misleading paths and uncover hidden secrets.
[media]

# DON'T FALL DOWN
Be careful what step you take, it could be your last.
[media]

Join Kira and his faithful teddy bear as they find themselves high above an abyss in a dark and mysterious realm. Every step could be their last, and only by facing the vertigo-inducing heights can they hope to escape. 

- Immerse yourself in a minimalist puzzle world brought to life with stunning 3D visuals that amplify the sensation of towering heights.
- Experience unique melodies and soundscapes that intensify the atmosphere and draw you deeper into Kira's journey.

# Are you brave enough to face your fears and help Kira find his way out?

# Jump into early access and be one of the first to experience the game! 

We’d love to hear your feedback! Join us on  **Reddit(r/Cubesc)** and **Discord (https://discord.gg/z9vn3H28)** help shape the future of the game.

Join Kira and his faithful teddy bear as they find themselves high above an abyss in a dark and mysterious realm. Every step could be their last, and only by facing the vertigo-inducing heights can they hope to escape. 

- Immerse yourself in a minimalist puzzle world brought to life with stunning 3D visuals that amplify the sensation of towering heights.
- Experience unique melodies and soundscapes that intensify the atmosphere and draw you deeper into Kira's journey.

# Are you brave enough to face your fears and help Kira find his way out?

# Jump into early access and be one of the first to experience the game! 

We’d love to hear your feedback! Join us on  **Reddit(r/Cubesc)** and **Discord (https://discord.gg/z9vn3H28)** help shape the future of the game.
